Past Workshops

Minting a DOI for your data using Zenodo

This workshop occurred on October 5, 2016

This webinar covered how to mint a DOI for our data using CERN's Zenodo data repository.

Writing a DMP for a NSF Grant

This workshop occurred on September 29, 2016

This webinar covered the National Science Foundation's data management requirements for their grants.

Citing Data

This workshop occurred on September 22, 2016

This webinar discussed the basics about citing data and why you should cite your data.

Writing a Data Management Plan (DMP)

This workshop occurred on September 15, 2016

This webinar looked at how to write a generic a data management plan
